forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 4am, then a chance of rain. Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. South southeast wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain. Mostly cloudy. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 55 in the afternoon. South southeast wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As the clock strikes the early hours in Downtown San Francisco, a gentle hush blankets the city, pregnant with possibility and the faint scent of a rainfall yet to come. The forecast whispers of a fragile 30% chance of rain tonight, a slight interlude before the skies unleash their full potential tomorrow. With the temperature settling around a cool 48 degrees, the air carries a crispness, mingling with the traces of humidity that suggest the onset of a marine layer. The southern breeze, barely stirring at 7 mph, invites a soft, almost introspective atmosphere.

Tomorrow, a more determined rain will sweep across the city, as temperatures hover around 59 before cascading down in the afternoon chill. With an 80% chance of precipitation, the clouds will likely drape over the golden hues of the daytime, casting the atmosphere in muted tones. In moments like these, one might select a cozy sweater complemented by a lightweight jacket—it’s a day to revel in the warmth of layers, adding an umbrella for that sense of precaution. As the drizzle embraces the streets, the city urges you to find refuge in one of its inviting cafes; perhaps indulge in a warm beverage and a good book, strolling the vibrant streets to appreciate the vitality of a city alive in rain. The flickering lights through moistened air will inspire a quiet reflection, as fog cloaks familiar landmarks, reshaping the scenery into something almost dreamlike, drenching the senses in tranquility.
